response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its value to you stands at $800,000, and we aim to bridge the gap between our valuation and yours. We are offering the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, allowing us to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing our earnings. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless and personalized experience tailored to your needs. Please let us know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
